epics.title: User Authentication
epics.summary: Implement user signup and login functionality.
epics.description: Implement user authentication using Next.js for the frontend and Node.js for the backend. Utilize PostgreSQL to store user credentials securely and implement JWT for session management.

epics.title: Product Data Models
epics.summary: Set up product and category data models.
epics.description: Design and implement data models for products and categories using PostgreSQL. Ensure necessary fields such as product name, description, price, category, and inventory are included.

epics.title: Basic UI Components
epics.summary: Create basic UI components for browsing and searching products.
epics.description: Develop basic UI components using Next.js to enable users to browse and search products efficiently. Ensure components are reusable and mobile-friendly.

epics.title: Cart and Wishlist
epics.summary: Implement shopping cart and wishlist functionality.
epics.description: Develop the shopping cart and wishlist functionality using Next.js for the frontend and Node.js for the backend. Use PostgreSQL for storing user-specific cart and wishlist data.

epics.title: Product Management Dashboard
epics.summary: Develop the admin dashboard for managing products, categories, and inventory.
epics.description: Build a centralized dashboard using Next.js and Node.js for administrators and sellers to manage products, categories, inventory, pricing, discounts, and orders. Integrate with PostgreSQL for storing and retrieving product data.

epics.title: Order Tracking and History
epics.description: Develop order tracking and history features using Node.js for backend processing and Next.js for frontend interfaces. Utilize PostgreSQL to store order details, status updates, and transaction records.

epics.title: Checkout and Payment Integration
epics.summary: Develop secure checkout and integrate multiple payment options.
epics.description: Implement a secure checkout process and integrate multiple payment gateways using Next.js for UI and Node.js for backend processing. Ensure transactions are securely logged and stored in PostgreSQL.

epics.title: Saved Addresses
epics.summary: Implement functionality for saving user addresses.
epics.description: Develop the functionality to save user addresses for quicker checkout using Next.js for frontend and Node.js for backend logic. Use PostgreSQL to store user address data securely.

epics.title: Promotions and Discounts
epics.summary: Implement system for applying promotions and discounts.
epics.description: Develop functionality to apply promotions and discounts during checkout using Next.js for frontend interfaces and Node.js for backend logic. Ensure integration with the order management and payment systems, with data stored in PostgreSQL.

epics.title: Analytics and Reporting
epics.summary: Create analytics and reporting tools for tracking platform performance.
epics.description: Develop analytics and reporting tools using Next.js for visualization and Node.js for data processing. Use PostgreSQL to store and retrieve performance metrics, user behavior, and sales data.

epics.title: Marketplace Expansion
epics.summary: Design infrastructure for supporting future marketplace expansion.
epics.description: Establish a scalable infrastructure using Next.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL to support future marketplace expansion. Ensure modular architecture to easily integrate new features and third-party services.
